title: 2005 CAF Champions League
text:
The 2005 CAF Champions League was the 41st edition of the <a href="CAF%20Champions%20League">CAF Champions League</a>, the <a href="Africa">Africa</a>'s premier club <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament prize organized by the <a href="Confederation%20of%20African%20Football">Confederation of African Football</a> (CAF). It was started on 29 January 2005 with a preliminary round. <a href="Al%20Ahly%20SC">Al Ahly</a> of <a href="Egypt">Egypt</a> defeated <a href="%C3%89toile%20du%20Sahel">Étoile du Sahel</a> of <a href="Tunisia">Tunisia</a> in the final to win their fourth title.
Qualifying rounds.
Preliminary round.
 
1 <a href="Wallidan%20FC">Wallidan FC</a> were withdrawn by the <a href="Gambia%20Football%20Federation">Gambia Football Federation</a>.
Knockout stage.
Semi-Finals.
The first leg was played on 24–25 September and the second on 15–16 October.
